long_description: we are a private development organization, built in costa rica in june 1987, with the objective of supporting lower income families to solve their housing and community development needs. for more than 30 years of work we have developed housing projects, under the habitat social production approach, promoting the active participation of people and families involved in its design, management, construction and consolidation as an organized and sustainable neighborhood. for which the institution offers technical advice, training, administrative and financial support; before, during and after the construction of the houses. we start from a participatory methodological proposal whereby individuals and families are directly involved in the construction process of their homes and their community. social production (of homes, neighborhoods, infrastructure, community organization), is managed by families to have living spaces that fit their conditions. this methodology is based on the union of people in the communities that seek well-being for their families, this implies the training, participation, responsibility, and solidarity of the people involved.
